name: Talk Heretic
_source: s;Simon;Calm down.{w} I'm just looking to investigate the shrine.
s;Raymond;Bah! Of course you'd like that.{w}{br}Not happening.{w}{br}See these seals?
s;Raymond;They're put here to protect the shrine.{w}{br}Damned Fates putting up a fight.
s;Simon;I see. Any way to disable them?
s;Raymond;I'm in the middle of trying to find out.{w}{br}So buzz off.
